advantages.name: Language fluency
advantages.desc: You speak, read and write another language fluently.

advantages.name: Stunning
advantages.desc: You are considered exceptionally good-looking, you turn heads everywhere you go.

advantages.name: Solo Cooking
advantages.desc: You regain one superficial health at the start of a session that begins with you preparing a meal.

advantages.name: Cell Chef
advantages.desc: Your entire cell regains one superficial health at the start of a session that begins with you preparing a meal for them.

flaws.name: Living on the Edge
flaws.desc: You suffer a compulsion to always partake of new experiences.

flaws.name: Weak-Willed
flaws.desc: Your will is weak and you struggle assert your own personality when confronted with the will of another.

flaws.name: Severe Addiction
flaws.desc: Lose 2 die from all pools if you do not indulge in your substance of choice during the last scene.

flaws.name: Addiction
flaws.desc: Lose 1 die from all pools if you do not indulge in your substance of choice during the last scene.

advantages.name: Unseemly Aura
advantages.desc: Monsters do not perceive you instantly as a mortal. Some can even mistake you for one of their own.

flaws.name: Stigmata
flaws.desc: You bleed from open wounds on your hands, feet, and forehead when you suffer physical injury or Willpower damage.

flaws.name: Crone's Curse
flaws.desc: Some supernatural curse afflicts you, you age rapidly and appear at least a decade older than you should. Lose 1 hp.
